Plot: The life, career and music of singer Katy Perry as we follow her on the California Dreams World Tour.
Title: Katy Perry: Part of Me
Actors: Katy Perry, Adam Marcello, Casey Hooper, Patrick Matera
tomatoConsensus: Katy Perry: Part of Me succeeds on the strengths of the pop star's genuine likability, inspiring work ethic, and dazzling stage show, even if it plays somewhat like a PR puff piece at times.
